source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT
    SC.CustomerID,
    PP.FirstName,
    PP.LastName,
    PEA.EmailAddress,
    PP.EmailPromotion,
    Ph.PhoneNumber,
    ST.Name AS TerritoryName,
	ST.CountryRegionCode,
	SCR.Name as CountryRegionName,
    CAST(CASE 
            WHEN SC.CustomerID NOT IN (
                SELECT DISTINCT CustomerID 
                FROM [Sales].[SalesOrderHeader]
            ) 
            THEN 0 
            ELSE 1 
         END AS BIT) AS Transaction_flag
FROM 
    [Sales].[Customer] SC
LEFT JOIN 
    [Person].[Person] PP ON SC.PersonID = PP.BusinessEntityID
LEFT JOIN 
    [Person].[PersonPhone] Ph ON Ph.BusinessEntityID = PP.BusinessEntityID
LEFT JOIN 
    [Person].[EmailAddress] PEA ON PEA.BusinessEntityID = SC.PersonID
LEFT JOIN [Sales].[SalesTerritory] ST on ST.TerritoryID = SC.TerritoryID
LEFT JOIN [Person].[CountryRegion] SCR ON SCR.CountryRegionCode = ST.CountryRegionCode
LEFT JOIN [Person].[BusinessEntityAddress] BEA ON BEA.BusinessEntityID = SC.CustomerID
ORDER BY CustomerID

SELECT HE.BusinessEntityID AS EmployeeID, HE.NationalIDNumber, he.LoginID,
HE.JobTitle, HE.BirthDate, HE.Gender, HE.CurrentFlag, HE.HireDate, HE.SalariedFlag, 
HE.VacationHours, HE.SickLeaveHours, 
SP.CountryRegionCode,
CR.Name AS CountryRegionName,
CAST(CASE
	WHEN HE.JobTitle LIKE '%Sales%' AND HE.BusinessEntityID!=273
            THEN 0 
            ELSE 1 
         END AS BIT) AS SalesPersonFlag
FROM [HumanResources].[Employee] HE
JOIN [Person].[BusinessEntityAddress] BEA
ON HE.BusinessEntityID = BEA.BusinessEntityID
JOIN [Person].[Address] PA
ON PA.AddressID = BEA.AddressID
JOIN [Person].[StateProvince] SP
ON SP.StateProvinceID = PA.StateProvinceID
JOIN [Person].[CountryRegion] CR
ON CR.CountryRegionCode = SP.CountryRegionCode

select Production.Product.ProductID, Production.Product.Name as ProductName, 
Production.ProductCategory.Name as Category_name,  Production.ProductSubcategory.Name as Subcategory_name,
Production.Product.StandardCost, Production.Product.FinishedGoodsFlag, Production.Product.Color, 
Production.Product.SafetyStockLevel, Production.Product.ReorderPoint, Production.Product.ListPrice,
Production.Product.Size, Production.Product.Weight, Production.Product.DaysToManufacture, Production.Product.ProductLine, Production.Product.Class,
Production.Product.Style
from  Production.Product 
left join Production.ProductCategory 
on  Production.ProductCategory.ProductCategoryID = Production.Product.ProductSubcategoryID
left join Production.ProductSubcategory 
on Production.ProductSubcategory.ProductSubcategoryID = Production.Product.ProductSubcategoryID

select PV.BusinessEntityID AS VendorID, PV.Name as VendorName, PV.ActiveFlag, PV.CreditRating, 
PV.PreferredVendorStatus,
SP.CountryRegionCode, CR.Name as CountryRegionName, PA.City
from [Purchasing].[Vendor] PV
JOIN [Person].[BusinessEntity] PB
ON PV.BusinessEntityID=PB.BusinessEntityID
JOIN [Person].[BusinessEntityAddress] BEA
ON BEA.BusinessEntityID = PV.BusinessEntityID
JOIN [Person].[Address] PA
ON PA.AddressID = BEA.AddressID
JOIN [Person].[StateProvince] SP
ON SP.StateProvinceID = PA.StateProvinceID
JOIN [Person].[CountryRegion] CR
ON CR.CountryRegionCode = SP.CountryRegionCode

scriptLines:
query: 'SELECT POH.PurchaseOrderID as PurchaseOrderKey, POH.EmployeeID AS EmployeeKey,
POH.VendorID as VendorKey, POH.ShipMethodID as ShipMethodKey,
OD.ProductID as ProductKey, od.UnitPrice, OD.OrderQty, OD.ReceivedQty, OD.RejectedQty, od.StockedQty,
PV.AverageLeadTime, -- THI TB NHN C HNG
convert(date,PV.LastReceiptDate,2) as DateKey,
PV.LastReceiptCost, PV.StandardPrice, PV.MinOrderQty, PV.MaxOrderQty
,POH.OrderDate, POH.ShipDate, POH.Status,
POH.TaxAmt, POH.TotalDue, POH.Freight
FROM [Purchasing].[PurchaseOrderHeader] POH
JOIN [Purchasing].[PurchaseOrderDetail] OD
ON POH.PurchaseOrderID = OD.PurchaseOrderID
JOIN [Purchasing].[Vendor] V
ON V.BusinessEntityID = POH.VendorID
JOIN [Purchasing].[ProductVendor] PV
ON PV.BusinessEntityID = V.BusinessEntityID',

query: 'select [Sales].[SalesOrderHeader].SalesOrderID as SalesOrderKey
, [Sales].[SalesOrderDetail].ProductID
, CustomerID
, SalesPersonID --=EMPkey
, TerritoryID
, ShipMethodID
, [Sales].[SpecialOfferProduct].SpecialOfferID
, convert (date, OrderDate,2) as DateSK
, DueDate
, ShipDate
, Status 
, OnlineOrderFlag
, Freight
, TaxAmt
, [Sales].[SalesOrderDetail].OrderQty
,[Sales].[SalesOrderDetail].[UnitPriceDiscount]
, [Sales].[SalesOrderHeader].SubTotal
, TotalDue as TotalPaid
from [Sales].[SalesOrderHeader]
inner join [Sales].[SalesOrderDetail]
on [Sales].[SalesOrderDetail].SalesOrderID = [Sales].[SalesOrderHeader].SalesOrderID
inner join [Sales].[SpecialOfferProduct]
on [Sales].[SpecialOfferProduct].ProductID = [Sales].[SalesOrderDetail].ProductID',
